question: Recently, the Parliament passed the IIIT Amendment Bill. The Bill provides national importance tag to how many new institutes?
explanation: The Parliament of India passes, The Indian Institutes of Information Technology (IIITs) Laws (Amendment) Bill, 2020 which seeks to confer the status of Institution of National Importance(INI) to Five IIITs which are located in Surat, Bhopal, Bhagalpur, Agartala and Raichur. It was introduced by Human Resource Development Minister Mr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank.
